About.title: About
About.mainAbout: My name is Yanderson, but my friends call me Yan, I say Iâ€™m born into technology, because when I was seven my father started working with IT, since that first contact, I stay close to technology and excited about the future of it all, After a long time doing maintenance on computers, I decided to study software development, go to college, shortly after being studying was already passionate about development and the possibilities of technology.
About.aboutTech: Currently I work as Full Stack Engenieer, accounting for 5 years using the Javascript stack with my current development tool. I specialize in React eviropment, both web and mobile.
About.aboutSubTech: However I have worked with Angular, Python, PHP and Node;

Charrua.jobDescription: Development of an application for the realization of sales, treatment of budgets, maintenance of users within the agribusiness, the application treats their information asynchronously and also stores offline on the device, together with the development of the administrative web application made to support the application, manage more accurately and in detail all the information used and sent by the application.
